# model

## About

Provides a schema protected api to a data [store](../store).

### Options

#### namespace

A table, collection, url, or other namespace.

#### properties

An array of properties describing the model's schema.

    "properties": [
        {
          "name": "title",
    			"type": "string"
        },
        {
          "name": "done",
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        {
          "name": "order",
          "type": "number"
        }
      ]
    }

### Dependencies

#### store

A [store](../store) module instance.
